comments:
This is found in the latest WTP, I20050422.

Just switch to the J2EE perspective, and you get several error-alert windows, which say "An error has 
occurred. See error log for details." I counted 6 of these dialogs when I was trying to do the "Bottom Up 
Web Service" tutorial. Then in the Project Explorer, a list of things, starting with "Other Projects" 
followed by 5 disclosure triangles, with no titles, then with "Web Services" at the end.

If I try and click on any of these entries, I get the same dialog.

I'm running on Mac OS X, 10.3.9. The JRE is 1.4.2

here's some of what got dumped to the console. It was a lot more than this, but this pattern of 
messages shows up about 5 times in the output.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jface 4 2 2005-04-25 15:04:13.325
